subject: Football
Relocation of Business
Television
Stadiums and Arenas
lead_paragraph: One or two teams in the Los Angeles market will limit networks’ freedom to show doubleheaders each week. And ratings might not be a positive story even if Los Angeles is the second-largest market in the country.
snippet: One or two teams in the Los Angeles market will limit networks’ freedom to show doubleheaders each week. And ratings might not be a positive story even if Los Angeles is the second-largest market in the country.
